DOC.brief_summary: The investigators planned to study relationship between osteoporosis and arterial rigidity within fractured patients cohort.
DOC.brief_title: Arteos II Study: Relationship Between Osteoporosis and Arterial Rigidity Within Fractured Patients Cohort
DOC.criteria: women and men > 60 years of age medical history of low energy fracture DXA Tscore 2,5 DS FREE AND INFORMED CONSENT SIGNED women and men < 60 years of age Corticoids treatment Breast cancer or prostat cancer medical history High energy fracture (traumatic fracture) No social security affiliation Incapacity to informed consent signed.
